name: TREBL3 : Rhythm game featuring indie music!
blurb: TREBL3: Rhythm Arcade is a free-to-play Flash rhythm game featuring awesome music by independent artists of all genres!

rewards.reward: In The Loop: Access to private news and updates about TREBL3 through our Kickstarter update blog, including video sneak peeks at new songs and features in the game!

Early Access: You will be given early access to play the game at least 7 days before its release date, and your name will be listed in the credits and on the game website. Also includes "In The Loop" rewards.

VIP Account: Your account will be upgraded to a VIP account (normally priced at $12), immediately unlocking all of the songs in the game and allowing you to purchase other upgrades (super powers, freeplay instruments, premium songs) for half price for one year. Also includes "Early Access" rewards.

Music Contributor: Search the internet for any song you'd like to put in the game, and we'll try our best to make it happen. You can even submit your own music! (See qualifications in the project description. Also includes "Early Access" rewards.)

Exclusive Music: This reward is for gaming portal and entertainment website owners. You will be able to pick a song (following the guidelines in the project description) which gamers will only be able to play on your site. Additionally, when a gamer plays ANY song on your site, they will earn 10% more in-game currency. A banner link to your website (along with a message encouraging the user to play at your site to earn more in-game currency) will be included in the game's Music Store. Please be aware that this package is not exclusive (although the song you pick will be) and does not include rebranding, external link removal, or API integration.

Exclusive Release Sponsor: This reward is for gaming portal and entertainment website owners. The game will be branded for your website, including a splash screen and a "Sponsored by:" graphic in the corner of the screen during gameplay. You will be able to pick three songs (following the guidelines in the project description) which gamers will only be able to play on your site. You will be given an exclusive first release of the game: it will not be available for play anywhere but on your site for fourteen days after release. (During these fourteen days, the banner links for other sponsors who purchased the "Exclusive Music" package will not be displayed in the game. Please be aware that these links will be enabled after the fourteen day exclusive release is over. Your branding will remain after the exclusive release.) You will permanently receive the secondary benefits of the "Exclusive Music" package (10% bonus currency + banner link) for your site. Please note: API integration is not included for the price of $550. If you would like to discuss adding API integration to this exclusive package, please contact me at (justinsmith@designbyjustinsmith.com). If possible, please include your API source (AS3) and an integration demo.
